channel.title: Do i need virtualbox installed if i wanna install whonix on an offshore server?
channel.description: suppose i have ssh access to a remote dedicated server and i wanna install whonix on that server, what should i do? should i first install virtualbox on that server through SSH? is there a tutorial or documentation on this?

item.title: Do i need virtualbox installed if i wanna install whonix on an offshore server?
item.dc:creator: cryptoware
item.description:
Patrick:

[quote]suppose i have ssh access to a remote dedicated server and i wanna install whonix on that server, what should i do? should i first install virtualbox on that server through SSH?

Any supported platform. Yes.

(Also answered here: https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1663.msg10076.html#msg10076)

is there a tutorial or documentation on this?

Not that I know.[/quote]
i know i asked it already some where else. but i really do not know how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Do i need virtualbox installed if i wanna install whonix on an offshore server?

suppose i have ssh access to a remote dedicated server and i wanna install whonix on that server, what should i do? should i first install virtualbox on that server through SSH?
Any supported platform. Yes.
